statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating, review_date FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123456;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, rating FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM Feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Review WHERE rating <= 3;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM Review WHERE product_id = 101;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, rating FROM Feedback ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE rating > 3 AND customer_id = 100;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM Feedback WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM Review WHERE product_id = 50 AND rating >= 4;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM Feedback WHERE customer_id = 200;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM Feedback WHERE rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT review_id, product_id, review_text FROM ProductReviews WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT analysis_id, feedback_id, sentiment_score, analysis_result FROM FeedbackAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 5, 7)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating = 5
SELECT product_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM ProductReviews GROUP BY product_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 4
SELECT analysis_result FROM FeedbackAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score >= 0.5 ORDER BY analysis_id ASC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, review_text, rating FROM customers INNER JOIN reviews ON customers.customer_id = reviews.customer_id WHERE reviews.product_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name, email FROM Customer WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM ProductReview ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT analysis_result FROM FeedbackAnalysis WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE id = 'c5981c6a-1886-4a71-b6a0-2c72485d0947';
SELECT id, feedback_text, rating FROM ProductReview WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT id, name, description FROM Product WHERE name LIKE '%example%';

SELECT Customer.name, CustomerFeedback.feedback_text, Product.name FROM CustomerFeedback JOIN Customer ON Customer.id = CustomerFeedback.customer_id JOIN ProductReview ON ProductReview.id = CustomerFeedback.id;
